name: Inked (itch)
description:
During one of your work days at the library, you realize that someone has forgotten an open book on one of the tables. Nothing unusual, except that althought the pages appear to be blank, you feel an irresistible desire to read it.

This game was created for the Make-A-Level (MAY DAY 2021)

(The goal was to make a platform game, with only one level)

Taking into account the theme of the jam (Emergency), you are trapped in a book and you will not be able to get out of it unless you manage to overcome all the obstacles that await you through its pages.

- Controls -

Arrow keys to move 

Z: Jump (Z x2: Double jump)

X: Punch

alternative keys:  A/D: Move   J: JUMP   K: Punch

- Features -
  • Enemies
  • Various obstacles and dangers
  • Jump on top of some enemies to destroy them
  • Boss (use the punch)
- Credits -

Programming / Code by

Javicoder https://javicoder.itch.io/

Art & Animation by

Isra Maraver https://motionsorcery.itch.io/

Music & Sound by

Alecxs Sunders https://alecxs-sunders.itch.io/

Font used in the texts by Lazaros Raphael https://www.dafont.com/es/lazaros-raphael.d1909?l[]=10&l[]=1
